DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare technology-based weight maintenance intervention use action plan , videos discussion board health behavior tracking ( weight , calorie , pedometer step ) technology-based standard advice group facilitate health management , resourcefulness health status rural middle-aged woman .
DOC.brief_title: Weight Maintenance Through Physical Activity Social Support Rural Middle-Aged Women
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose research project evaluate influence theory-based intervention use Health Effects Life Transitions Women Model promote maintenance initial weight loss . The intervention design promote physical activity prevent weight regain among underserved vulnerable population rural , mid-life woman . The intervention deliver action plan , video , discussion board health behavior tracking ( weight , calorie , pedometer step ) facilitate health management , resourcefulness health status compare standard advice group receive newsletter health behavior tracking ( weight ) initiate , increase , sustain physical activity weight maintenance .
DOC.criteria: Women : age 4064 year ; report intentional weight loss 510 % initial body weight within previous 6 month ; reside rural county ( population < 50,000 resident ) rural community ( population less 2,500 ) within drive distance UNMC College Nursing campus ; ability communicate English ( verbal write ) ; ambulatory walk least one block without use assistive device , cane , walker , wheelchair ; access internet current email account ; answer 'no ' question Physical Activity Readiness Questionnaire ( PARQ ) obtain clearance physician become active . instructed physician exercise ; presence chest pain , shortness breath , feeling lightheadedness upon exertion .
